attributes.action: Drummer Lee Rigby's Attackers should be convicted under the Treason ACT 1351 - as a crime against the Crown
attributes.additional_details:
This Petition is to convict the Killers of Drummer Lee Rigby and ALL Islamic Extremist of High Treason under the Treason Act Of 1351 as a direct attack against the Crown!
All convicted Islamic Extremist should be sentenced in accordance with the Treason Act 1351.
All State Benefits, NHS Care, and British Rights should be stopped with immediate effect!
These individuals who wish to risk the security of British Citizens, the State and the Crown should not be entitled to any British Tax Payers money!
